lead_paragraph: RATNER--Michael. The Board of Governors and staff of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade Archives (ALBA) mourns the loss of Michael Ratner, a longtime defender of civil liberties and social justice. His visionary leadership leaves a lasting and inspiring legacy. We extend deepest condolences to his family. Fraser Ottanelli, Chair of the Board; Ellyn Polshek, Vice-Chair; Marina Garde, Exec Director 1/3
